item.title: Join us at Clarke Quay to celebrate F1 with special meal promotions and parties at Attica
item.description:
Source: Clarke Quay website. Clarke Quay is celebrating the Singapore Grand Prix season with special offers and events for both racing fans and those just looking to enjoy the festivities. Everyone can take advantage of dining deals like buy-one-get-one-free offers at District 10, special Grand Prix menu items at Hooters, and a free meal for every four diners at Peony Jade. Those with Grand Prix tickets can also enjoy discounts of 10% to 20% at participating restaurants...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/join-us-at-clarke-quay-to-celebrate-f1-with-special-meal-promotions-and-parties-at-attica/
